conbody.p: In the Configurations section, you can specify:

li.p: Configuration: the WinAppDriver URL and desired capabilities.
Application File: the absolute path to the Windows executable file (*.exe) of the testing machine. For Windows users, click on the Browse... button to locate the application file.

conbody.p: When the application under test (AUT) is started, the utility captures all available Windows objects on the current window of the AUT and displays them in the All Objects section.
